message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}
Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Run tests
steps.run:
if [ -f docker-compose.test.yml ]; then
  docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yml build
  docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yml run test
else
  docker build . --file Dockerfile
fi

steps.name: Build image
steps.run: docker build . --file Dockerfile --tag $IMAGE_NAME

steps.name: Log into registry
steps.run: echo "${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}" | docker login docker.pkg.github.com -u ${{ github.actor }} --password-stdin

steps.name: Push image
steps.run:
IMAGE_ID=docker.pkg.github.com/${{ github.repository }}/$IMAGE_NAME
# Change all uppercase to lowercase
IMAGE_ID=$(echo $IMAGE_ID | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]')
# Strip git ref prefix from version
VERSION=$(echo "${{ github.ref }}" | sed -e 's,.*/\(.*\),\1,')
# Strip "v" prefix from tag name
[[ "${{ github.ref }}" == "refs/tags/"* ]] && VERSION=$(echo $VERSION | sed -e 's/^v//')
# Use Docker `latest` tag convention
[ "$VERSION" == "$default-branch" ] && VERSION=latest
echo IMAGE_ID=$IMAGE_ID
echo VERSION=$VERSION
docker tag $IMAGE_NAME $IMAGE_ID:$VERSION
docker push $IMAGE_ID:$VERSION

steps.name: Install dependencies
steps.run: npm ci

steps.name: Run TypeScript checks
steps.run: npx tsc --noEmit

steps.name: Run linting
steps.run: npm run lint

steps.name: Check formatting
steps.run: npm run format-check

steps.name: Run tests
steps.run:
if [ -f docker-compose.test.yml ]; then
  docker compose --file docker-compose.test.yml build
  docker compose --file docker-compose.test.yml run test
else
  docker build . --file Dockerfile
fi

steps.name: Build image
steps.run: docker build . --file Dockerfile --tag $IMAGE_NAME

steps.name: Push image
steps.run:
IMAGE_ID=ghcr.io/${{ github.repository }}/$IMAGE_NAME
# Change all uppercase to lowercase
IMAGE_ID=$(echo $IMAGE_ID | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]')
# Strip git ref prefix from version

# Strip "v" prefix from tag name

# Use Docker `latest` tag convention
[ "$VERSION" == "$default-branch" ] && VERSION=latest
echo IMAGE_ID=$IMAGE_ID
echo VERSION=$VERSION
docker tag $IMAGE_NAME $IMAGE_ID:$VERSION
docker push $IMAGE_ID:$VERSION
